# view

**Instance Property**

The view that is currently presenting the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var view: SKView? { get }
```

## Discussion

To present a scene, you call the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKView/presentScene(_:)] method or [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKView/presentScene(_:transition:)] method on the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKView] class. If the scene is not currently presented, this property holds `nil`.

## Setting the Background Appearance

- **Creating a Scene with a Transparent Background**: Set a transparent background color to show the content of the views below.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the scene.
